meta.description: Introducing the Halo Bigcommerce Template, crafted for the Electronics market to offer a streamlined and immersive shopping experience. With a sleek, modern design, Halo showcases electronic products like smartphones, laptops, and gadgets in high-quality images and smooth galleries. Customization features allow customers to filter and compare with ease, helping them find exactly what they need. Designed to work seamlessly across all devices, the responsive layout ensures a flawless experience on desktop, tablet, or mobile. Intuitive navigation, smart search, and secure checkout make shopping fast, easy, and safe. Enhance your electronics store with Halo's advanced, user-centered design.

settings.featuredCate2_desc1: Domed Stickers are popular for labeling and brand identity by a growing number of industries
settings.featuredCate2_desc2: See your logo on multiple products at once in an easy and quick way
settings.featuredCate2_desc3: Best-in-class, full custom color logo and text, wide range of background, and borders on our Prestige name badge
settings.featuredCate3_desc2: Large Capacity and Fast Charging Power On-the-Go for All Your Devices
settings.featuredCate3_desc3: Premium Wireless Earbuds with Noise Cancellation for an Immersive Audio Experience
settings.featuredCate3_desc4: 2K Supper HD, Enjoy a safe life with Security Pan and Tilt Camera CP6
settings.reviewBlock_desc1: Everything turned out perfectly. They look amazing. Affordable. Shipped fast.
settings.reviewBlock_desc2: First time ordering from Custom Genie so was not quite sure what to expect. The pens look great, arrived quickly, work as they should, and priced very competitively.
settings.reviewBlock_desc3: Fast ship - stickers were well made and exactly as ordered. AAA+++
settings.reviewBlock_desc4: I have ordered a few times and now I am also placing orders for my “sister offices and companies”. The name badges have always been perfect! Great price, fast shipping and fantastic product!!
settings.bannerWithText_desc: The word "Chic" suggests elegance and trendiness, indicating that the wigs offered are modern and fashionable
settings.service_desc1: Experience the magic of Genie-Speed! Delivery in 7 days or less. Need it faster? Let us know.
settings.service_desc2: We don't charge fees, so you save more.
settings.service_desc3: Whether you need just one or a thousand pens, there is no minimum order required.
settings.subscribe_desc: Unlock Special Deals! Sign up and discover enchanting promotions and insider tips.
settings.contact_us_item5:
Hours:
Monday - Friday: 9am to 5pm EST
Closed Saturday and Sunday
settings.contact_us_faqs_text1: How long have you been in the industry?
settings.contact_us_faqs_desc1: We have been in the printing industry for more than 30 years, gathering a vast amount of professional knowledge that we can use to help you create the perfect custom stickers or labels for your company. Other aspects of promotional printing that we can provide include Name Badges, Stickers, Pens and Embroidered, Sublimated and Digitally Printed Patches, Embroidery, Transfers, and other apparel decorations.
settings.contact_us_faqs_text2: Can you help me design my product?
settings.contact_us_faqs_desc2: Of course! Our website has a fantastic, easy-to-use name badge designer but if you need additional support please reach us at info@customgenie.com or 1-877-422-0624.
settings.contact_us_faqs_text3: I have a Resale Tax Certificate and shouldn't be charged taxes, how do I set this up?
settings.contact_us_faqs_desc3: Email the Resale Tax Certificate to info@customgenie.com or fax it to 1-800-880-2073 (Attn: NBI) along with your account information and the account will be updated on the back-end so that orders submitted under this company will not be charged for taxes. CG only charges taxes when delivering shipments to states in where we have a physical location including Florida, Georgia, Illinois, California and Texas. Shipments to all
settings.halo_ask_an_expert_desc1: Ask an expert anything on Custom Genie
settings.halo_ask_an_expert_desc2: We will follow up with you via email within 24-36 hours
